title: Episode 24: Chappaquiddick
description:
Jovember continues with an episode dedicated to the Chappaquiddick scandal Senator Ted Kennedy waited 10 hours before telling police he had driven off the side of a bridge, into Poucha Pond, and left Mary Jo Kopechne to die in his car fully submerged in water. That wasn't quite his story though...

itunes:author: Cloud10 and iHeartPodcasts
itunes:subtitle: A tragic accident that cost Mary Jo Kopechne her life and Senator Ted Kennedy the Presidency.  What really happened that fateful night?
